author: Wolfgang Laun <wolfgang.laun@gmail.com>
subject_original: Re: [rules-users] mvel strict-mode not applied in drools 5.3.1.Final
subject: mvel strict-mode not applied in drools 5.3.1.Final
message_snippet: @Jörg: Why would Drools 5.1.1. not be usable with Java 1.7? Byte code is supposed to be upward compatible. -
first_text_message:
@Jörg:

>>     On 04/04/2012 11:04, korgen wrote:
>>    we updated Drools from 5.1.1 to 5.3.1 (as in 5.1.1
>>     language level
>>     > 1.7 is not supported).

Why would Drools 5.1.1. not be usable with Java 1.7? Byte code is
supposed to be upward compatible.

-W
first_text_message_without_quotes: @Jörg: Why would Drools 5.1.1. not be usable with Java 1.7? Byte code is supposed to be upward compatible. -W
